Package Run4YourBits

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Background
    This class is in charge of painting and managing the different types of obstacles as well as the character and its collisions
    Character
    This class defines the behavior of the main avatar and its different animations, it also includes the score,speed and the multiplier variables.
    Checkpoint
    This class defines the behavior of the checkpoint
    CompatibleImage
    This class uses the system's configuration and optimizes the images accordingly.
    Config
    Menu for volume configurations for both sound and music
    CustomButton
    This class creates button with the right look and feel for the project
    EndMenu
    Menu displayed at the end each game
    Fondo
    Background for the different menus
    Game
    This class is the main method for the frame and creates the different levels
    HighObstacle
    This type of obstacle hovers in midair, requiring you to duck in order to avoid crashing with them and lose a life by doing so
    HighscoreDialog
    Menu for setting new highscores
    Highscores
    Menu to display the top ten highscores
    LevelSelect
    Menu that allows you tou select each fo the different levels
    Lives
    This class generates the remaining hits images and changes them according to the number of hits left
    LowObstacle
    Usually with around the same height as the character these obstacles must be avoided by jumping so you won't crash with them and lose a life by doing so.
    Main
    Run the whole game
    Menu
    Main menu used to access all sections of the project
    MultithreadSystem
    This class creates a second thread in the application that runs simultaneously with other running threads, using the defined classes in the main method.
    Obstacle
    This class defines the behavior of the standard obstacle and defines its methods
    PauseMenu
    Menu displayed when pausing the game
    PowerUp
    Defines the behavior for the different Power-Ups
    RandomRange
    This class creates random numbers in a certain range, it includes inclusive and exclusive methods
    Score
    Structure for saving score with the user's name
    SimpleSoundPlayer
    The SimpleSoundPlayer class encapsulates a sound that can be opened from the file system and later played.
